```python
from fastapi import FastAPI
from pydantic import BaseModel
from queue import SimpleQueue
from uuid import uuid4

app = FastAPI()
Q = SimpleQueue()

class BuildReq(BaseModel):
    persona: str = "artist"
    user_uid: str = "bi-no-che"
    targets: list[str] = ["web","audio"]

@app.post("/api/build_invite")
def build_invite(req: BuildReq):
    task = {
        "task_id": str(uuid4()),
        "intent": "build_invite",
        "inputs": req.dict(),
        "artifacts": ["data/storyboard.json","data/personas.json"],
        "constraints": {"offline": True, "lang": "ko"}
    }
    Q.put(task)
    return {"ok": True, "task_id": task["task_id"]}
```

```python
import sys, wave, struct, math, os

def env(t, dur):
    # 2ì´ˆ í˜ì´ë“œì¸/ì•„ì›ƒ + í˜¸í¡í˜• ìŠ¤ì›°
    fade = min(1.0, max(0.0, min(t/2.0, (dur-t)/2.0)))
    breath = 0.85 + 0.15*math.sin(2*math.pi*(t/6.0))
    return fade * breath

def section_gain(t):
    # 0-10, 10-30, 30-60, 60-100, 100-120 êµ¬ê°„ë³„ ì‚´ì§ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ë³¼ë¥¨
    if t < 10: return 0.5
    if t < 30: return 0.6
    if t < 60: return 0.7
    if t < 100: return 0.8
    return 0.55

def render(uid, seconds=120, sr=44100, outdir="outputs/invites/audio"):
    os.makedirs(outdir, exist_ok=True)
    path = f"{outdir}/{uid}.wav"
    wf = wave.open(path, "w")
    wf.setnchannels(2)
    wf.setsampwidth(2)  # 16-bit
    wf.setframerate(sr)

    # ê¸°ë³¸ ì½”ë“œí†¤(C-E-G) + ì•„ì£¼ ë¯¸ì„¸í•œ ì½”ëŸ¬ìŠ¤/ë¹„ë¸Œë¼í† 
    f1, f2, f3 = 261.63, 329.63, 392.00
    max_amp = 32767
    for n in range(int(seconds*sr)):
        t = n/sr
        vib = 0.3*math.sin(2*math.pi*(t/8.0))  # ì•„ì£¼ ëŠë¦° ë¹„ë¸Œë¼í† 
        a = env(t, seconds) * section_gain(t) * 0.2  # ì „ì²´ ë ˆë²¨
        s = (
            math.sin(2*math.pi*(f1+vib)*t) +
            math.sin(2*math.pi*(f2-0.4*vib)*t) +
            math.sin(2*math.pi*(f3+0.2*vib)*t)
        ) / 3.0
        # ì•½ê°„ì˜ ê³µê¸°ê°
        noise = 0.02*(2*(hash((n*1103515245)&0xffffffff)&1)-1)
        val = max(-1.0, min(1.0, a*s + noise))
        sample = int(val * max_amp)
        wf.writeframes(struct.pack("<hh", sample, sample))
    wf.close()
    print(path)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    uid = sys.argv[1] if len(sys.argv)>1 else "bi-no-che"
    seconds = int(sys.argv[2]) if len(sys.argv)>2 else 120
    render(uid, seconds)
```

```python
# ---------- app: naeda_cli ----------
naeda_cli = r'''#!/usr/bin/env python3
import json, os, sys, pathlib
ROOT = pathlib.Path(__file__).resolve().parent
def load(p): return json.load(open(p,"r",encoding="utf-8"))
def render(tpl, ctx):
    s = tpl
    for k,v in ctx.items():
        if isinstance(v,(str,int,float)): s = s.replace("{{"+k+"}}", str(v))
    # keywords
    if "keywords" in ctx:
        b="{% for kw in keywords %}"; e="{% endfor %}"
        if b in s:
            pre, rest = s.split(b,1); loop, post = rest.split(e,1)
            inner="".join(loop.replace("{{kw}}",str(kw)) for kw in ctx["keywords"])
            s = pre+inner+post
    # scenes
    if "scenes" in ctx:
        b="{% for sc in scenes %}"; e="{% endfor %}"
        if b in s:
            pre, rest = s.split(b,1); loop, post = rest.split(e,1)
            inner=""
            for sc in ctx["scenes"]:
                seg = loop.replace("{{sc.id}}", sc["id"])
                seg = seg.replace("{{sc.t[0]}}", str(sc["t"][0]))
                seg = seg.replace("{{sc.t[1]}}", str(sc["t"][1]))
                seg = seg.replace('{{" / ".join(sc.text.lines)}}', " / ".join(sc["text"]["lines"]))
                inner += seg
            s = pre+inner+post
    # audio
    if "audio" in ctx:
        b="{% for cue in audio %}"; e="{% endfor %}"
        if b in s:
            pre, rest = s.split(b,1); loop, post = rest.split(e,1)
            inner=""
            for cue in ctx["audio"]:
                seg = loop.replace("{{cue.t[0]}}", str(cue["t"][0]))
                seg = seg.replace("{{cue.t[1]}}", str(cue["t"][1]))
                seg = seg.replace("{{cue.cue}}", str(cue["cue"]))
                inner += seg
            s = pre+inner+post
    return s

def build_invite(uid, persona=None):
    personas = load(ROOT/"data/personas.json")
    story = load(ROOT/"data/storyboard.json")
    userp = load(ROOT/"data/users"/f"{uid}.json")
    if not persona: persona = userp.get("persona","default")
    pal = personas.get(persona, personas["default"])["palette"]
    kws = userp.get("preferred_keywords", personas.get(persona, personas["default"]).get("keywords", []))
    tpl = open(ROOT/"templates/html/index.html","r",encoding="utf-8").read()
    ctx = {
        "name": userp.get("name",""), "persona": persona, "palette": ",".join(pal),
        "keywords": kws, "scenes": story["scenes"], "audio": story["audio"]["structure"],
        "bpm": story["audio"].get("bpm",58), "bg": pal[0], "accent": pal[-1],
        "p1": pal[0],"p2": pal[1],"p3": pal[2],"p4": pal[3],"p5": pal[4]
    }
    html = render(tpl, ctx)
    out = ROOT/"outputs/invites/web"/uid
    out.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    (out/"index.html").write_text(html, encoding="utf-8")
    print("[OK] Web preview:", out/"index.html")

if __name__=="__main__":
    if len(sys.argv)>=3 and sys.argv[1]=="build_invite":
        build_invite(sys.argv[2], sys.argv[3] if len(sys.argv)>=4 else None)
    else:
        print("Usage: python naeda_cli.py build_invite <uid> [persona]")
'''

const j=await r.json();document.getElementById('msg').innerHTML=j.ok?'<span class=ok>ì ‘ìˆ˜ '+j.job_id+'</span>':'<span class=err>ì—ëŸ¬</span>';refresh();}
async function refresh(){const r=await fetch('/status');const j=await r.json();document.getElementById('status').textContent=JSON.stringify(j,null,2);}
refresh();setInterval(refresh,2000);
</script>"""
class H(BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
    def _json(self,code,obj):
        b=json.dumps(obj).encode('utf-8'); self.send_response(code)
        self.send_header('Content-Type','application/json; charset=utf-8'); self.send_header('Content-Length',str(len(b)))
        self.end_headers(); self.wfile.write(b)
    def do_GET(self):
        if self.path in ('/','/index.html'):
            b=HTML.encode('utf-8'); self.send_response(200); self.send_header('Content-Type','text/html; charset=utf-8')
            self.send_header('Content-Length',str(len(b))); self.end_headers(); self.wfile.write(b); return
        if self.path=='/status':
            self._json(200,{"status":"ok",**STATUS,"counts":{x:len(list((JOBS/x).glob('*.json'))) for x in ('inbox','processing','done','error')}}); return
        self.send_error(404)
    def do_POST(self):
        if self.path!='/task': self.send_error(404); return
        l=int(self.headers.get('Content-Length','0')); data=json.loads(self.rfile.read(l) or b'{}')
        try:
            STATUS["received"]+=1
            job_id=f"{int(time.time())}_{uuid.uuid4().hex[:8]}"; data["job_id"]=job_id; data["ts"]=int(time.time())
            p=INBOX/f"{job_id}.json"; tmp=INBOX/f".{job_id}.tmp"
            tmp.write_text(json.dumps(data,ensure_ascii=False,indent=2),encoding='utf-8'); os.replace(tmp,p)
            STATUS["accepted"]+=1; self._json(200,{"ok":True,"job_id":job_id})
        except Exception as e:
            STATUS["errors"]+=1; self._json(500,{"ok":False,"error":str(e)})
def run(): HTTPServer(('127.0.0.1',8787),H).serve_forever()
if __name__=='__main__': run()
'''
sena_worker = r'''#!/usr/bin/env python3
import os, time, json, subprocess, pathlib, platform
ROOT = pathlib.Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
HUB = ROOT/"hub"; INBOX=HUB/"jobs"/"inbox"; PROC=HUB/"jobs"/"processing"; DONE=HUB/"jobs"/"done"; ERR=HUB/"jobs"/"error"
for d in (INBOX,PROC,DONE,ERR): d.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
def run_cmd(cmd, cwd=None): return subprocess.run(cmd, cwd=str(cwd or ROOT), stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, text=True)
def handle(job):
    t=job.get("type"); uid=job.get("uid","bi-no-che"); persona=job.get("persona","artist")
    sysname=platform.system().lower()
    if t=="build_invite":
        if sysname.startswith("win") and (ROOT/"scripts"/"run_web_preview.ps1").exists():
            return run_cmd(["powershell","-ExecutionPolicy","Bypass","-File", str(ROOT/"scripts"/"run_web_preview.ps1"), "-uid", uid, "-persona", persona])
        elif (ROOT/"scripts"/"run_web_preview.sh").exists():
            return run_cmd(["bash", str(ROOT/"scripts"/"run_web_preview.sh"), uid, persona])
        else:
            return run_cmd(["python3","naeda_cli.py","build_invite",uid,persona])
    return None
def loop():
    print("[Sena] watching", INBOX)
    while True:
        for p in sorted(INBOX.glob("*.json")):
            job=json.loads(p.read_text(encoding="utf-8")); q=PROC/p.name; p.replace(q)
            try:
                res=handle(job); (DONE/(q.name+".log")).write_text(res.stdout if res else "no output", encoding="utf-8"); q.replace(DONE/q.name)
            except Exception as e:
                (ERR/(q.name+".err")).write_text(str(e), encoding="utf-8"); q.replace(ERR/q.name)
        time.sleep(1)
if __name__=="__main__": loop()
'''
```
